text: David Antonio Rugamas Leiva (born 17 February 1990 in San Juan Opico, La Libertad, El Salvador) is a Salvadoran professional football player, who plays as a forward. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list El Salvador's goal tally first. No. Date Venue Opponent Score Result Competition 1\. 7 March 2019 Banc of California Stadium, Los Angeles, United States 2–0 3–1 Friendly 2\. 2 June 2019 Robert F. Kennedy Memorial Stadium, Washington, D.C., United States 1–0 1–0 Friendly 3\. 25 March 2021 Estadio Cuscatlán, San Salvador, El Salvador 2–0 2–0 2022 FIFA World Cup qualification 4\. 28 March 2021 Ergilio Hato Stadium, Willemstad, Curaçao 1–0 1–1 2022 FIFA World Cup qualification 5\. 5 June 2021 Bethlehem Soccer Stadium, Upper Bethlehem, U.S. Virgin Islands 3–0 7–0 2022 FIFA World Cup qualification 6\. 5 June 2021 Bethlehem Soccer Stadium, Upper Bethlehem, U.S. Virgin Islands 5–0 7–0 2022 FIFA World Cup qualification 7\. 5 June 2021 Bethlehem Soccer Stadium, Upper Bethlehem, U.S. Virgin Islands 7–0 7–0 2022 FIFA World Cup qualification 8\. 8 June 2021 Estadio Cuscatlán, San Salvador, El Salvador 2–0 3–0 2022 FIFA World Cup qualification 9\. 12 June 2021 Warner Park, Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis 1–0 4–0 2022 FIFA World Cup qualification 10\. 12 June 2021 Warner Park, Basseterre, Saint Kitts and Nevis 3–0 4–0 2022 FIFA World Cup qualification == References == Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Salvadoran footballers Category:Association football forwards
title: David Rugamas
